com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.internal.event

Class EventRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.pinpoint.internal.event.EventRecorder

  • public class EventRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to record events and submit events to Pinpoint.
